Squashing bugs and making minor improvements!

Love the JCP app? Please leave us a five star review! Questions or comments? Please leave us a message in the app or email us at apphelp@jcp.com

Bug fixes and enhancements.

Check out our new re-designed Orders page which allows you to quickly see your most recently purchased products and their shipping status!

Face ID with iPhone X is now supported! Scan those faces and login with ease.

As always, we continue to make minor improvements and squash every bug in sight!

Love the JCP app? Please leave us a five star review! Questions or comments? Please leave us a message in the app or email us at apphelp@jcp.com.

Our new Wallet has arrived! We heard your feedback and worked hard to deliver an experience that we know you will love. This includes the ability to:
• Quickly access your coupons, gift cards, payment methods, and rewards
• View a snapshot of your rewards status
• Use your wallet In-Store or Online

But that’s not all! Other enhancements include:
• Find Similar: see an item you like when you search and browse? Tap on Find Similar to create a new set of results to explore similar items.
• Product Compare: want to compare appliances side-by-side? Tap on the Compare icon when you search and browse appliances.
• Bug fixes and performance enhancements

Love the JCP app? Please leave us a five star review! Questions or comments? Please leave us a message in the app or email us at apphelp@jcp.com

Love Deals? 10 Days of Non-Stop Beauty & Fashion deals just for you! Check back each day so you don’t miss out and make sure to visit the store for even more exclusive offers.

Spring is in the air which means Prom Season is approaching! Make sure you’re ready and dressed to impress!
• See the latest trending prom dresses and accessories
• Need a closer look? Pinch and Zoom so you get all the detail you need!

As always, we are squashing bugs and improving the shopping experience every day.

We’re A/B testing a new homepage design that aims to simplify the overall look and feel while also providing more relevant information to you up front and center. Download this update to see if you get slotted into this experiment ;) If you do, please share your feedback with us through the app under your account settings.

And as always, we’ve squashed bugs and added performance enhancements. If you love our app, please leave us a rating and review! If you have any issues, please contact us directly at apphelp@jcp.com

Check out our redesigned app! We incorporated your feedback and overhauled our look and feel. Our mission is to always show you the best deals and make your shopping experience as easy and personalized as possible.

And as always, we squashed bugs and added performance enhancements.

If you love our app, please leave us a rating and review! If you have questions or concerns, please contact us directly through the App Feedback function on the app Account page.

We made performance enhancements to make our homepage content load faster; we also squashed a ton of bugs.

• Compliance with the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA). Please see the updated Customer Service > Security & Privacy section in the app.
• Addressed some issues reported by our app users. (Thanks for your feedback! Please keep it coming.)
• Made some changes to improve app performance.

We made two major feature updates:

1) Our in-store price check tool will show pricing even when item information is not available
2) Our product display page has been optimized to create a smoother browsing experience

We updated our account profile pages to make it easier for you to manage your details and information.
If you love our app, please leave us a rating and review! If you have questions or concerns, please contact us directly through the "Tell Us" button on the app Account page.

We’re rolling out a new checkout flow that is easier to use! We also improved the Price Checker on the Stores page for an easier in-store experience.

If you love our app, please leave us a rating and review! If you have questions, feedback, or concerns, please contact us directly through the "Tell Us" button on the app Account page.
Bug fixes and performance improvements

Feature Enhancements:
- You can now view store maps on the Stores tab!

Bug Fixes:
- We fixed some crashes that occurred during the checkout process

This update contains:

1) a bug fix to address blurry product images
2) crash fixes for our cart and checkout flow
This release contains a minor update to our search functionality.
We made updates to improve the usability of our product display pages. And as always, we fixed several bugs.
We've made it easier for you to save items for later, and have fixed several bugs to make your shopping experience better.
We fixed a bug that prevented customers from booking Salon and Sephora appointments.

We made two major feature updates:

1) Our in-store price check tool will show pricing even when item information is not available
2) Our product display page has been optimized to create a smoother browsing experience

We made three major feature updates:

1) Our in-store price check tool will show pricing even when item information is not available
2) Our product display page has been optimized to create a smoother browsing experience
3) Our product recommendations will now be more personalized

We have made the following updates:
1) Product detail page validations have been optimized to help the user select right product attributes.
2) My Orders page has been optimized to give user an optimized order level view of all the orders.
3) As always, we fixed bugs and did performance enhancement changes.

We have made the following updates:
1) Product detail page validations have been optimized to help the user select right product attributes.
2) My Orders page has been optimized to give user an optimized order level view of all the orders.
3) As always, we fixed bugs and did performance enhancement changes.

We have made the following updates:

1) Some improvements on how we present deals on the home screen.
2) Fixed bugs and did performance enhancement changes.

What’s New:
1. We have made some changes for iOS 13 compatibility.
2. As always fixed bugs and made some changes to enhance app performance.

1. We have introduced a secondary navigation feature to give app users quick access to the latest event shopping experience and also one tap access to your favorite coupons. We are still testing this feature, let's see if you are the lucky one to interact with it.
2. As usual we fixed bugs and critical issues and made changes to enhance the app performance.

1. Made some tweaks to smooth out some friction points with shopping events/ featured story presentations on the app.
2. Fixed some issues/ bugs as always. Thanks for your feedback!
3. Made some changes to enhance app performance.

Exciting updates abound for our JCPenney customers who shop at our North East Mall location in Hurst, TX!

We’ve added special in-store features to make your shopping experience easier, such as:
- Ask An Associate to receive 1:1 help
- Reserve To Try On to reserve items for in-store fitting
- The Barbery for your hairstyling and grooming needs
- And much more

Please enable location services to use these features when you’re at North East Mall.

• Fixed some critical bugs and issues reported by our app users (you).
• Made some performance enhancement changes to improve your app experience.

• Some critical bugs along with issues reported by our app users (you) were fixed.
•. Made some changes to enhance app performance.

•Fixed a number of issues based on your feedback (thanks!).
•Made some changes to enhance app performance.

• Compliance with the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA). Please see the updated Customer Service > Security & Privacy section in the app.
• Addressed some issues reported by our app users. (Thanks for your feedback! Please keep it coming.)
• Made some changes to improve app performance.

• Compliance with the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA). Please see the updated Customer Service > Security & Privacy section in the app.
• Addressed some issues reported by our app users. (Thanks for your feedback! Please keep it coming.)
• Made some changes to improve app performance.

• Now users can login and reset their app password using their phone number. Just specify your phone number, verify it with the code received and you are good to go.
• Found a coupon on the app that you like? Now you can apply it to your empty cart and begin your shopping. It will automatically get applied if the merchandise you added meets the coupon criteria.
• We have made field validation messaging more intuitive to make your checkout experience smoother.
• We have added new and exciting presentation styles for our shopping events. Let's see if you come across some of them and if they can grab your attention.
• Fixed issues reported by our app users. (Thanks for your feedback).
• Made some changes to enhance app performance.

• Fixed issues reported by users from the last update. (Thanks for your valuable feedback!)
• Made changes to enhance app performance.

• Not sure what size would fit you in a particular brand? In this release we have introduced TRUEFIT, a tool to help our app users find the right size by simply answering a few quick questions. No measuring tape needed. Give it a try and be amazed. And Its FREE!
• Love Manufacturer Rebates? Now our app customers can easily identify products for which manufacturer rebate is available and quickly avail the same. Just look for a red "Rebates Available" sign.
• Now you will see product videos (where available) right on the top in product image gallery on product details page. Tap and enjoy!
• We are testing Key Feature icons on the product details page to help our app users know more about the salient features without having to read the product description. See if you are lucky to find them.
• Need FREE shipping? Now it is easy for our app users to quickly add within their cart a gift card of any denomination to meet the free shipping threshold. Checking out just became so much easy.
• As always fixed issues reported by our app users. We appreciate your feedback. Please keep it coming.
• Made some changes to enhance app performance.

• Fixed some issues reported by our app users.
• Made some changes to enhance app performance.

• Made some changes to the Orders section of the App. You can now filter your orders by time along with some additional visual changes.
• We are testing changes to our app navigation. See if you are lucky one to experience the new layout.
• Changed your mind? Want to cancel an order? Now you can do so (time bound) from the order details page.
• Now displaying final price with coupon on bundled goods on product details page to give more clarity on what entire bundle may cost compared to individual items.
• Can’t find the product in the gallery? See if the product recommendations in the end gets you excited?

• We made some changes to how we present time-bound deals and promotions on the home page. You can’t miss it now.
• Liked a coupon? We have now made it easy to shop a coupon quickly from Home page and coupons section. Just apply the one you like to your empty cart and begin shopping. It’s that simple!
• We are going to test some changes to the primary navigation to make access to the wallet section easy. See if you are lucky to land on the new navigation experience. Don’t forget to give us your important feedback on the new experience.
• Fixed some issues reported by our app users.
• Also made some changes to enhance app performance.

• Also made some changes to enhance app performance.

• We are expanding our primary navigation test that makes access to the wallet section easy. Don’t forget to give us your feedback, especially if you are seeing this new experience.
• Made additional product and sales images tappable.
• Fixed several bugs reported by our app users.
• Improved app performance & security.

• We rolled out a new Curbside Pickup experience. It’s now easier than ever to pick up orders at most JCPenney stores.
• With the redesigned countdown timer, you can see how long you have left to take advantage of coupons and deals.
• Fixed several bugs reported by our app users.
• Improved app performance & security.

• With our new and improved coupon experience, you can see our best coupon anytime so you always get the best deal. 
• We rolled out a new experience for select items when choosing the “pick up in-store” option. Now enjoy even greater deals on the items you love! 
• CCPA – Do Not Sell My Personal Information
• Fixed several bugs that our users reported
•  Fixed several bugs reported by our app users
•  Fixed bugs reported by our app users and introduced content updates.

• Further improved our Curbside experience by making it clear when stores are open and closed for pickup.
• Improved app performance & security.
• Fixed several bugs that our users reported.

.
•  We improved our pickup discount display, making it easier to see which items are eligible.

• Updated our Curbside Pickup icons and images on “Store” pages for a more consistent experience in our app.
• Updated how we display pricing on product pages.
• Users can now scroll to the top of the Homepage by double-tapping on the “Home” icon in the app for a faster navigation experience.
• Improved app performance & security.
• Fixed several bugs that our users reported.

- Updated our Curbside Pickup Guest check-in flow messaging.
- Optimized our store search capability to recognize searches in all caps, mixed caps or all lowercase.
- Updated online only vs. in-store only coupon display.
- Improved app performance & security.

- Improved how we display low-in-stock items for free store pickup.
- Improved app performance & security.

- Improved our order details page by displaying tracking number information for “Ship to Store” items.
- Improved app performance & security.

- Updated our curbside experience by adding in more customer updates after check-in.
- Improved app performance & security.

- Improved our order details page by displaying tracking numbers with specific shipments for easier order tracking and visibility.
- Improved the accuracy of our estimated delivery date on the product details page.
- Improved app performance & security.
- Fixed several bugs that our users reported.
